stories.intro: Getting started is often the hardest part. That's why 10+ existing hubs are inviting you to learn more about a new IDG dimension each month, starting January 2023.
stories.story:
Whether you're new to the IDGs or already familiar with the framework, you're invited to join this upcoming theme and learn more about each of the IDG dimensions.

There will be discussions, events and opportunities to learn together with people from different parts of the world.

The first month, we're starting with the Being dimension.
stories.title: Invitation: Join 10+ Hubs and Explore One IDG Dimension Every Month

events.name: IDGs Gathering: Reclaiming Our Human Interconnectedness
events.description:
If we are to move forward and bring the power of collective intelligence to solve global challenges faced by humanity, we must reclaim our human interconnectedness. This interconnectedness — and the empathy it fosters — will be essential to our ability to move forward together.

In this gathering, Radhika Vachani, founder of the Institute of Inner Well-being & Excellence (IWE) and author of Just Breathe, shares her extensive 25-year journey with inner well-being, which included studying with renowned yoga and meditation masters in India. She offers her perspectives and an experiential practice to demonstrate how we might awaken to a deep inner awareness and reclaim our interconnectedness as a human race.

[Register and learn more](https://idg-gathering-dec08.confetti.events/)

On December 15, we will officially launch the IDG Toolkit which will complete Phase 2!  We'd like to invite our community to this gathering in gratitude and celebration, and look forward into Phase 3 of the project together.

Sign up here: https://forms.gle/reTb1sCQwkuyTBV79
events.name: Public Toolkit Launch
